title: Join a Zoom meeting on iPhone or iPad

steps.text: Open the Zoom app. Get it from the App Store if you haven't already.
steps.tts: Open the Zoom app. Get it from the App Store if you haven't already.

steps.text: Tap "Join a Meeting" on the first screen.
steps.tts: Tap Join a Meeting on the first screen.

steps.text: Type the meeting ID from your invite (9 or 10 digits).
steps.tts: Type the meeting ID from your invite. It's nine or ten digits.

steps.text: Tap "Join." Enter your name if asked, then tap OK.
steps.tts: Tap Join. Enter your name if asked, then tap OK.

steps.text: Enter the meeting passcode if you see a box for it. You're now in the meeting.
steps.tts: Enter the meeting passcode if you see a box for it. You're now in the meeting.
